languages.text: "Они все мои. Всегда были моими и такими и останутся. Теперь нет ни секунды, что я их не слышу. Столько... вероятностей... Столько судеб. Мы... Я теряюсь в них, но, только потерявшись окончательно, я смогла найти свою. Она ужасна. Нет, прекрасна! Нет... какая же она? Опять потеряла. Но я найду, снова найду, только чуть-чуть потеряюсь..."

"They're all mine. They've always been mine and always will be mine. Not a second goes by that I don't hear them now. So many... possibilities... So many destinies. We— I get lost in them, but only by losing myself completely was I able to find my own. It is terrible. No, beautiful! No... What is it like? I've lost it again. But I'll find it, I'll find it again, I'm just a little bit lost..."
languages.original_text: "Они все мои. Всегда были моими и такими и останутся. Теперь нет ни секунды, что я их не слышу. Столько... вероятностей... Столько судеб. Мы... Я теряюсь в них, но, только потерявшись окончательно, я смогла найти свою. Она ужасна. Нет, прекрасна! Нет... какая же она? Опять потеряла. Но я найду, снова найду, только чуть-чуть потеряюсь..."

We— I get lost in them, but only by losing myself completely was I able to find my own. It is terrible. No, beautiful! No... What is it like? I've lost it again. languages.text: «Todas son mías. Siempre han sido mías, y siempre lo serán. Ahora no pasa un solo instante sin que las oiga. Son tantas... posibilidades... tantos destinos. Nosotr.... Yo, yo me pierdo en ellas, pero solo perdiéndome por completo a mí misma fui capaz de hallar la que me pertenece. Es terrible. ¡No, es hermoso! No... ¿cómo es? La he vuelto a perder. Pero la encontraré, la volveré a encontrar; es solo que me siento un poco perdida...».
languages.original_text: "They're all mine. They've always been mine and always will be mine. Not a second goes by that I don't hear them now. So many... possibilities... So many destinies. We— I get lost in them, but only by losing myself completely was I able to find my own. It is terrible. No, beautiful! No... What is it like? I've lost it again. But I'll find it, I'll find it again, I'm just a little bit lost..."

traits.locale_text: «Todas son mías. Siempre han sido mías, y siempre lo serán. Ahora no pasa un solo instante sin que las oiga. Son tantas... posibilidades... tantos destinos. Nosotr.... Yo, yo me pierdo en ellas, pero solo perdiéndome por completo a mí misma fui capaz de hallar la que me pertenece. Es terrible. ¡No, es hermoso! No... ¿cómo es? La he vuelto a perder. Pero la encontraré, la volveré a encontrar; es solo que me siento un poco perdida...».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「すべてはあたいの声よ。今までも、これからもあたいの声としてあり続ける。もはや声が聞こえない時はないの。多くの可能性…多くの運命が存在する。我々…あたいは時々、声の海で自分を見失ってしまう時があるけれど、慈雲を見失うことでしか自分の声を感じ取れないのよ。酷いものでしょう。ううん、美しいことよ！いいえ…どんな気分だったかしら？また見失ってしまったわ。でも、いつかは見つけられる。ちょっと迷っているだけよ…」
languages.original_text: "They're all mine. They've always been mine and always will be mine. Not a second goes by that I don't hear them now. So many... possibilities... So many destinies. We— I get lost in them, but only by losing myself completely was I able to find my own. It is terrible. No, beautiful! No... What is it like? I've lost it again. But I'll find it, I'll find it again, I'm just a little bit lost..."

traits.locale_text: 「すべてはあたいの声よ。今までも、これからもあたいの声としてあり続ける。もはや声が聞こえない時はないの。多くの可能性…多くの運命が存在する。我々…あたいは時々、声の海で自分を見失ってしまう時があるけれど、慈雲を見失うことでしか自分の声を感じ取れないのよ。酷いものでしょう。ううん、美しいことよ！いいえ…どんな気分だったかしら？また見失ってしまったわ。でも、いつかは見つけられる。ちょっと迷っているだけよ…」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “它们都是我的声音。它们一直是我的声音，也永远都会是我的声音。如今，我每时每刻都在聆听这些声音，如此多的……可能性……如此多的命运。我们……我迷失在其中，但只有彻底迷失之后，我才能找到自己。这太可怕了。不，太漂亮了！不……它是什么样的？我又迷失了，但我会找到的，我会再次找到的，我只是有点迷路了……”
languages.original_text: "They're all mine. They've always been mine and always will be mine. Not a second goes by that I don't hear them now. So many... possibilities... So many destinies. We— I get lost in them, but only by losing myself completely was I able to find my own. It is terrible. No, beautiful! No... What is it like? I've lost it again. But I'll find it, I'll find it again, I'm just a little bit lost..."

traits.locale_text: “它们都是我的声音。它们一直是我的声音，也永远都会是我的声音。如今，我每时每刻都在聆听这些声音，如此多的……可能性……如此多的命运。我们……我迷失在其中，但只有彻底迷失之后，我才能找到自己。这太可怕了。不，太漂亮了！不……它是什么样的？我又迷失了，但我会找到的，我会再次找到的，我只是有点迷路了……”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Toutes ces voix sont les miennes. Elles l'ont toujours été et ça ne changera jamais. Il ne se passe plus une seconde sans que je les entende, maintenant. Tant de... possibilités. Tant de destins. Nous... Je me perds en elles, mais ce n'est qu'en me perdant complètement que j'ai réussi à trouver la mienne. C'est horrible. Non, c'est magnifique ! Non... Qu'est-ce que c'est ? Je l'ai encore perdue. Mais je la trouverai, je la retrouverai, je suis juste un peu perdue... »
languages.original_text: "They're all mine. They've always been mine and always will be mine. Not a second goes by that I don't hear them now. So many... possibilities... So many destinies. We— I get lost in them, but only by losing myself completely was I able to find my own. It is terrible. No, beautiful! No... What is it like? I've lost it again. But I'll find it, I'll find it again, I'm just a little bit lost..."

traits.locale_text: « Toutes ces voix sont les miennes. Elles l'ont toujours été et ça ne changera jamais. Il ne se passe plus une seconde sans que je les entende, maintenant. Tant de... possibilités. Tant de destins. Nous... Je me perds en elles, mais ce n'est qu'en me perdant complètement que j'ai réussi à trouver la mienne. C'est horrible. Non, c'est magnifique ! Non... Qu'est-ce que c'est ? Je l'ai encore perdue. Mais je la trouverai, je la retrouverai, je suis juste un peu perdue... »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Sie sind alle mein. Sie waren schon immer mein und werden immer mein bleiben. Es vergeht keine Sekunde mehr, in der ich sie nicht höre. So viele ... Möglichkeiten ... So viele Bestimmungen. Wir ... ich verliere mich in ihnen. Aber nur indem ich mich selbst vollständig verloren habe, konnte ich meine eigene finden. Es ist grauenhaft. Nein, wunderschön! Nein ... Wie ist es? Ich habe es wieder verloren. Aber ich finde es wieder, ich finde es wieder, ich habe mich nur ein klein wenig verloren ..."
languages.original_text: "They're all mine. They've always been mine and always will be mine. Not a second goes by that I don't hear them now. So many... possibilities... So many destinies. We— I get lost in them, but only by losing myself completely was I able to find my own. It is terrible. No, beautiful! No... What is it like? I've lost it again. But I'll find it, I'll find it again, I'm just a little bit lost..."

languages.text: "Hepsi benim sesim. Hep benimdiler ve hep benim olacaklar. Konuşmalarını duymadığım tek bir saniye bile hatırlamıyorum. Öyle çoklar ki... Çok fazla kader yazılmış. Biz... Ben bazen aralarında dalıp giderim. Ancak ne zaman ki kendimi tamamen kaybederim, işte o vakit kendi sesimi bulurum. Berbat bir his. Hayır, güzel aslında! Hayır... Nasıl bir histi? Yine daldım. Ama bulacağım, tekrar bulacağım. Şu an kendimi biraz kaybettim sadece."
languages.original_text: "They're all mine. They've always been mine and always will be mine. Not a second goes by that I don't hear them now. So many... possibilities... So many destinies.
